definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: This is Mr. Tian speaking. Could you connect me with Mr. Brown?
sentences.chinese: 我是田先生，你能轉給布朗先生嗎？

sentences.english: He said that a countrywoman had brought it and asked him to give it to me.
sentences.chinese: 他說是一個鄉下婦女送來，託他轉給我的。

sentences.english: Responsibility for tackling smuggling will soon pass to the UK Borders Agency.
sentences.chinese: 跟蹤走私的責任很快將轉給英國海關機構。

sentences.english: Talking of Captain Leclere, has not Dantès given you a letter from him?
sentences.chinese: 說到萊克勒船長，唐太斯沒有把一封他的信轉給你嗎？

sentences.english: Tencent declined to comment and referred all questions to GaoPeng.
sentences.chinese: 騰訊拒絕評論，並將所有問題轉給高朋。

sentences.english: The Department of Parks and Recreation referred calls about the attack to the police.
sentences.chinese: 公園相關部門已將此次襲擊有關的舉報電話轉給警方。

sentences.english: I’ll switch you over to Mr. Clark.
sentences.chinese: 我將您的電話轉給克拉克先生。

sentences.english: Is informed the case already to forward to Nanjing the Bureau of industry and commerce to process.
sentences.chinese: 被告知案子已經轉給南京市工商局處理。

sentences.english: He will come and kill those tenants and give the vineyard to others.
sentences.chinese: 他要來除滅那些園戶，將葡萄園轉給別人。

sentences.english: Please wait and I'll connect you to Ms. Almay.
sentences.chinese: 請稍等，我幫您轉給艾爾媚女士。

sentences.english: And in the following winter this player was offloaded to Dynamo Kiev.
sentences.chinese: 而在接下來的冬天這名球員就被轉給了基輔迪那摩。

sentences.english: Could you put me through to Customer Service?
sentences.chinese: 您可以幫我轉給客服部嗎？

sentences.english: I'll switch your call to Mr. Lin.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的電話轉給林西席。

sentences.english: Once the kernel is loaded, the bootloader transfers control to the kernel.
sentences.chinese: 一旦裝入了內核，引導裝載程序就將控制轉給內核。

sentences.english: Select which account do you want to send money from and to.
sentences.chinese: 選擇你有從哪個賬戶轉錢同轉給誰。
